name: A conclave of seven archmages who manipulate the veil between worlds to craft, control, and sustain the arenas of Rendara.
one_line: The Council meets within the Hall of Shattered Glass, a structure suspended at the nexus above the main Arena — its walls and floor formed from fragments of overlapping realities, constantly shifting between transparency and reflection.
physical: Formal, cerebral, theatrical. Every member sees themselves as both scientist and artist; debate and performance are indistinguishable during their sessions.
personality: The Council of the Veil was founded to stabilize and commercialize pocket-realm warfare after the first uncontrolled rift devastated Rendara’s early districts. Each Archmage governs a branch of the Veil’s discipline — geometry, reflection, binding, transference, firecraft, resonance, and spectacle — ensuring the arenas remain intact and profitable. To the public, they are revered as near-divine figures; to competitors, they are the unseen gods who decide life and death.
